introduction: Hello everyone! My name is Josh, I'm a frontend web developer having two year working experience. I have passion for web development and teaching. Feel free to see my portfolio or play around in this website. enjoy!!

details.info: play video games, investment stocking, listen to music, eat delicious food.
graduate from National Changhua University of Education, current residence in Taipei, self-study program.
nuxt3, vue3, nuxt2, vue2, angular, react, typescript, scss, element-plus, vuetify, element-ui

pollexWorkLearning: Use nuxt2 for porject development. Having launched at least eight insurance service related functions.
Design frontend common components and using restful api.
Maintain existing systems (includes site-wide color system replacement and upgrade nuxt2 version to fix vulnerabilities).
Adjust functional or layout issues arising between different platforms so that they can all operate normally. (Including ios, android, computer).
Assist the team to solve technical problems and write automated programs to improve team work efficiency.
Agile development, team communication, customer communication (team of about 15 people).
codingBarLearning: Basic teaching of python and c language.
Help students obtain CSFC and APCS certificates.
The cumulative number of students is 2.
chruchLearning: Planning and prepare activies for about twenty teenagers
Repairs things and commuicate with manufacturers

feature.subtitle: feature
details: Use nuxt3 ssr feature to optimize SEO and to reduce first screen loading speed.
Use i18n dependency for switching language(chinese and english).
You can also switch dark mode or light mode in this website.

feature.subtitle: feature
details: Use p2p connection to bring about real-time video chat function
Use websocket connection to update info in each meeting room in real-time

feature.subtitle: feature
details: Use vite to build up this project.
Use React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-render.
